text: Nummah Yalli moominiinih kaxxa niqmat yeceeh ken guneh keenik yan farmoyta keenih Ruube waqdi Qhuraan Aayoota keenil yakriyeeh uma caalootaa kee koroosannuk ken Saytunnoysa, Qhuraan kitab kee Cadiis ken Barsa usun (koros kinnuk) tama Yallih farmoyti Rubsumak duma Baxxaqqa iyya maxqawitih (mako) Addat Sugeeniih
